name: mp3legally
overview:
MP3Legally is a search engine with a simple web design, which uses the world’s largest music database. High quality music at a very good price, tracks are very cheap at only $0.10 a track, full albums from $1. And offer a huge selection of music to download and it’s always being updated.

Signing Up Registering with mp3legally is really easy, it takes a few seconds., you just need to give your email and a password and you’re done. After signing up, mp3legally give you 10 Free downloads so you can get started on the site.

Music Selection mp3legally.com music library has over 3,237,582 tracks, making our site one of the biggest music database, so you’re bound to find something you want to download. Our music base is full of old and new music, charts, new releases, bestsellers, as well as older albums that are hard to find on other sites. The site allows previews of music to make sure you’re getting what you want.

File formats & Bitrates mp3legally.com only offer mp3s and flac. This means they can be used and played on every mp3 device you may have. They are also all DRM free so they can be used anywhere and there is no limitation to the number of copies you can have. Music quality ranges from Song quality ranges from 128kbps to 320kbps to FLAC.

Getting Tracks to your PC All you need to do to download music is click the ‘Download’ button next to the track or album, and it will start downloading to your pc straight away. Easy as that!
